Translations.Text: Zhongren a! Nimen yingdang jingwei nimen de zhu, fuhuo shi di dizhen, que shi yi jian dashi

Zai na ri, nimen kanjian dizhen xia mei ge rumu dou bei xia de wangjile ying'er, xia de mei ge yunfu dou yao liuchan; ni ba renmen kan cheng shi zui han, qishi tamen bingfei shi zui han, er shi yin wei an la de xingfa shi yanjun de
Youren wuzhi di jinxing guanyu an la de zhenglun, bingqie shuncong panni de emo
Fan jiejiao emo zhe, emo biding shi ta mi wu, biding ba ta yinru huo yu de xingfa, zhe shi gei zhudingle de

Zhongren a! Ruguo nimen duiyu fuhuo de shi hai zai huaiyi zhi zhong, name, wo que yi chuangzaole nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong yi xiao di jingye, ji yong yikuai ningxie, ji yong wanzheng de he bu wanzheng de rou tuan, yibian wo dui nimen chanming (daoli). Wo shi wo suo yu de (tai'er) zai zigong li anju yige dingqi, ranhou, wo shi nimen chusheng wei ying'er, ranhou (wo rang nimen huozhe), yibian nimen dadao chengnian. Nimen zhong you yaozhe de; you fu fan yu zui lie de nianji de, yibian ta zai you zhishi zhihou, shenme ye bu zhidao. Ni kan dadi shi bumao de, dang wo shi yushui jiang yu dadi de shihou, ta jiu huodong he pengzhang, erqie shengchu ge zhong meili de zhiwu
Zhe shi yin wei an la shi zhen zai, ta neng shi sizhe fusheng, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng
Fuhuo que shi yao lailin de, hao wuyi yi. An la yao shi fenmu li de ren fuhuo qilai
Youren zhenglun an la, dan ta ji wu zhishi, you wu zhidao, qie wu canlan de jingdian
Ta aoman de zou kai, yibian you ren panli an la de dadao. Ta zai jinshi yao shou lingru, fuhuo ri wo yao ta changshi shaozhuo de xingfa
Zhe shi yinwei ni suo fan de zuixing, ye yin wei an la jue bushi kuidai zhong puren de
